Title: Sets internal investigative standards and practices for police officers with respect to matters of police conduct
Summary: Sets internal investigative standards and practices for police officers with respect to matters of police conduct; supersedes contrary provisions of law or collective bargaining agreements.
LawCode: Add ยง204-b, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to internal investigative standards and practices for police officers
